overview_of_class: Course Objective: To examine the challenges and opportunities in fully integrating people with disabilities into the communities they live in. Labeling theory, stigma, reciprocal competency, and community organizing will be drawn on to understand how to achieve functional integration.
name: Community Integration of Labeled People
title: SoC COMM_ST 340-0-20 Community Integration of Labeled People
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Communication Studies Majors only

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Course Objective: To examine the challenges and opportunities in fully integrating people with disabilities into the communities they live in. Labeling theory, stigma, reciprocal competency, and community organizing will be drawn on to understand how to achieve functional integration.

subject: COMM_ST
